Reference

All functions

EuclDist()

Calculate Euclidean distance between two points

areaPerParea()

Compute percent area covered by process areas

errMinBboxLength()

PCM Runout Distance Error

getVertices()

Get vertices from a polygon

minBBoxSpatialPolygons()

Minimum area bounding box for spatial polgyons

minbb()

Minimum area bounding rectangles

pcmGetGrid()

Get PCM runout distance grid search values

pcmGetOpt()

Get PCM runout distance grid search optimal parameters

pcmGetOpt_single()

Get PCM runout distance grid search optimal parameters for single event

pcmGridsearch()

Grid search optimization for PCM runout distance

pcmPerformance()

PCM runout distance performance

pcmPoolSPCV()

Pool PCM spatial cross-validation results

pcmSPCV()

Perform (repeated) spatial cross-validation of PCM optimization

rasterCdf()

Cumulative Distribution Function for Rasters

rasterMinMaxRescale()

Min-max normalization (Rescaling)

rasterThreshold()

Raster binary reclassification

rocParea()

Compute area under ROC curve for process areas

rotxy()

Rotate bounding box

runoutGeom()

Runout Geometry

runoutPareaPredict()

Runout process areas from source area prediction

rwGetOpt()

Get random walk grid search optimal parameters

rwGetOpt_single()

Get random walk runout distance grid search optimal parameters for single event

rwGridsearch()

Grid search optimization for random walk runout path

rwPerformance()

Random walk runout path performance

rwPoolSPCV()

Pool random walk spatial cross-validation results

rwSPCV()

Perform (repeated) spatial cross-validation of random walk optimization

spcvFoldsPoly()

Make spatial partitions (using k-means clustering)
